Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hi, i'm a (VERY) long time lurker but this is my first post (that i can
remember).

I've finally got some time to work with NEAT but i'd like some advice from
the group about which language version to work with.

I'm very familiar with Java so would much prefer to work with a Java version
but these seem to have been untouched for some time. Is the c# version any
more up-to-date?

I've downloaded JNeat and got it working fine but thought i'd ask this
question before i went any further in case i'm using a wildly out of date
version and missing out on something.

Thanks for any help and advice.

-- 
Trevor Burton
http://www.flashmonkey.org
http://www.infrared5.com

--00151758b3b08ad5ab0479e4d185
